<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.66

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Multiplayer

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns [[true]] when playing a game in '''solo multiplayer''' (for example Apex coop campaign PLAY SOLO option).

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''isMultiplayerSolo'''

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_state = [[isMultiplayerSolo]];</code>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[isMultiplayer]], [[isDedicated]], [[hasInterface]], [[isServer]]
</value></part></template>
